subject: Self Care
title: Character Strengths
description: Learn Character Strengths in one minute.

hook.text: Seligman and Peterson cataloged 24 character strengths across cultures. Knowing yours changes how you approach your entire life.

buildup.text: Strengths include creativity, bravery, kindness, curiosity, fairness, humor, and perseverance. Everyone has a unique top five.

discovery.text: Using your top strengths daily increases engagement, productivity, and life satisfaction. Strengths use creates flow naturally.

twist.text: Most people can't name their strengths. We're trained to fix weaknesses, not leverage them. The positive approach works better.

climax.text: Take the free VIA Character Strengths survey. Learn your top five. Then find one way to use your number one strength tomorrow.

punchline.text: Know your strengths. Use them daily. Joy follows naturally.

quiz.question: What happens when you use your top character strengths daily?
options: It increases engagement, productivity, and life satisfaction
